channel.title: vscode on Yoichi Kawasaki
channel.description: Recent content in vscode on Yoichi Kawasaki

item.title: GitHub Actions Article on Software Design magazine (2022/02 Issue)
item.description: A Software Design 2022/02 Issue was published in Jan 18, 2022, in which I contributed the 2nd special feature article on CI/CD using GitHub Actions. 『Software Design 2022年2月号』（技術評論社）/ Software Design 2022/02 Issue (gihyo) Gihyo Online Amazon

item.title: Visual Studio Code Textbook for programmer was published!
item.description: A book, I co-authored with @hoisjp and @_Dr_ASA, was recently published. Today I went to a bookstore to see if it was actually displayed. It was real!! 🎉🎉🎉 『プログラマーのためのVisual Studio Codeの教科書』（マイナビ出版）/ Visual Studio Code textbooks for programmers Softcover version Kindle version
